title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 840.6 - Disclosure of jury lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 840.6 - Disclosure of jury lists

State Regulations

Pursuant to the authority conferred
upon this court by section
509
(a) of the Judiciary Law, it is
ORDERED, that any application made by
counsel for a party pursuant to Judiciary Law, section 509(a), for disclosure
of the list of potential jurors for use in counsel's trial preparation shall be
directed to and determined by the trial judge or justice, and it is
further
ORDERED, that such applications shall
be made upon notice to the Commissioner of Jurors and the other parties to the
litigation, and it is further
ORDERED, that this procedure shall be
effective November 10, 1989. DATED AND ENTERED: October 16, 1989

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
840.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
